<style>

/*
ODH Template
author:ninja huang
site:https://github.com/ninja33/odh
*/

.card {
  margin: 12px;
  text-align: left;
  background-color: #fff;
  background-image: url(_clean_green.jpg); 
  background-attachment: fixed;
}

.section {
  color: #414141;
  background-color: #fefefe;
  font-family:"Segoe UI", Arial, "Microsoft Yahei", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 5px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3),0 0px 0px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  border-radius: 4px;
  margin: 8px 0;
}


.items{
  margin: 0 12px;
  padding: 10px 0;
}

.items a{
  color: #414141;
  text-decoration:none;
}

#audio{
  margin-left: 5px;
}

#audio img{
  width: 64px;
  height: 64px;
}

.section hr{
  border: 0;
  margin: 0 12px;
  border-top: 1px solid #e5e5e5;
}

hr{
  border        : 1px;
  margin        : 5px 0;    
  border-top : 1px solid #d5d5d5; 
}

#front, 
#back{
  line-height: 1.4em;
}

#front{
  text-align: left;
  vertical-align:middle;
}

#expression{
  font-size: 1.4em;
  font-weight: bold;
}

#reading{
  font-weight:normal;
  margin:0 5px;
  font-size: 0.8em
}

#note{
  font-weight:normal;
  margin:0 5px;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  color: #414141;
  text-decoration:none;
}

#back{
}

#front-extra1 {
}

#front-extra2{
}
#back-extra1{
}
#back-extra1{
}

._collins_c .explanation_item ul:empty{
  margin:0;
  padding:0;
}

.odh-playsound {
  vertical-align: text-bottom;
  margin: 0 3px;
}

.chn_tran{
  display:initial; 
  /*display:none; */
}

.chn_sent{
  display:initial; 
  /*display:none; */
}

</style>

<script>

//有mp3文件的单词发音
function playAudioMp3() {
}

//给没有mp3文件的单词用，调用youdao的api发音
function playAudio(wordID) {

    var word = document.getElementById(wordID).innerText;
	
	//有道发音
    var base = "http://dict.youdao.com/dictvoice?type=2&audio="; 
	//百度发音
    //var base = "http://fanyi.baidu.com/gettts?lan=en&text=";
    var audioSrc = base + encodeURI(word);

    //检查是否为电脑端
    if(typeof(py)=="object"){
    //如果是电脑端，需安装插件 #498789867(replay button on card)才能发音
        py.link("ankiplay"+audioSrc)

    }else{
        var player=document.getElementById('player');
        player.src=audioSrc;
        player.play();
    }
}

//全局监听keycode  g=71
$(document).keydown(function(event){
	if(event.keyCode == 71){
		sayWord();
	}
});

function makeCloze(){
    //定义需要镂空的HTML元素
    var clozeTags=["#front-extra1 b"];

    clozeTags.forEach(function (tag){
        var objects = document.querySelectorAll(tag);
        [].forEach.call(objects, function (obj){
            obj.innerHTML = obj.innerHTML.replace(/./g,"•");
            obj.style.textDecoration = "underline";
            obj.style.letterSpacing = "1px";
        });
    });
}



</script>

    var word = document.getElementById(wordID).innerText;
	
	//有道发音
    var base = "http://dict.youdao.com/dictvoice?type=2&audio=";

    var audioSrc = base + encodeURI(word);

    //检查是否为电脑端
    if(typeof(py)=="object"){
    //如果是电脑端，需安装插件 #498789867(replay button on card)才能发音

        player.src=audioSrc;
        player.play();
    }
}

//全局监听keycode  g=71
$(document).keydown(function(event){

});

function makeCloze(){
    //定义需要镂空的HTML元素
    var clozeTags=["#front-extra1 b"];

}
